root: ^Are you interested in learning more about the material for creating a CPU called Silicon Wafer?

c-0: ^Defeating the enemies here will grant you a material, which is the Silicon Wafer.
^The silicon wafer used in the production of CPUs is a critical material in semiconductor manufacturing.
^It is a thin, circular slice of semiconductor material, typically made from purified silicon (Si), which serves as the substrate for building integrated circuits (ICs), including the CPU.
^If you're wondering why Silicon was the chosen material, it's because this chemical element is the best candidate for a semiconductor.
^Because of its semiconductor properties - it can act as both a conductor and an insulator under different conditions, making it ideal for controlling electrical currents in processors.
^Thank you also for knowing more about Silicon Wafer. May your adventures come to fruition.
